name: Introverted Party Experience
description:
This was made in 3 weeks time for a game design class with a group of people 

The game is based on the theme of 'gauntlet'

The premise is to figure out a way to get everyone to leave this party you have arrived at even though you are introverted and have anxiety. You will learn how to save your world and prepare for anxiety attacks every so often

Controls are WASD
